name: sherry gaba

jv_history.source_quote: I interviewed Sherry Gaba, LCSW who is a psychotherapist and love coach special

what_you_do: Licensed therapist providing counseling, psychotherapy, and coaching to help people overcome toxic relationships, codependency, and underlying trauma.
who_you_serve: Individuals struggling with codependency, toxic relationships, narcissistic abuse, love addiction, trauma, anxiety, and depression.
social_proof: LCSW (License # LCS 21765), Certified Coach, award-winning author, appeared on Dr. Drew Pinsky's Celebrity Rehab, VH1's Sober House, Celebrity Rehab's Sex Addiction, helped thousands of people, certified to provide teletherapy in Florida.
signature_programs: Love Smacked: How to Stop the Cycle of Relationship Addiction and Codependency to Find Everlasting Love (book), The Love Fix, audio programs, courses, codependency quiz/assessment, Internal Family Systems (IFS) Therapy, Somatic Experiencing & Polyvagal Therapy
business_focus: Licensed psychotherapy and coaching helping individuals overcome codependency, toxic relationships, and trauma to create healthier relationships.
service_provided: Psychotherapy, counseling, relationship coaching, codependency coaching, trauma therapy, anxiety therapy, depression counseling, Internal Family Systems (IFS) therapy, Somatic Experiencing, Polyvagal Therapy, online courses, audio programs, teletherapy
